headline.main: Hunger and Sickness Afflict Mississippi Negro Children; Tufts Project Gives Medical Services to County's Poor

byline.original: By RICHARD D. LYONSSpecial to The New York Times

docs.abstract: article on OEO-aided Tufts U med services project, Bolivar County, Miss, describes malnutrition among Negro children in rural Miss; illus; drs comment
docs.lead_paragraph: MOUND BAYOU, Miss -- The baby was too weak to cry.
docs.snippet: MOUND BAYOU, Miss -- The baby was too weak to cry.
